column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My bf and I went on a Friday night
column2: and.... we were the sole customers
column3: which I thought was odd. Our server was great and we waited about 30 mins for our pizza (the Lou) to arrive. We were expecting to need a box to take home leftovers because we'd read that while the pie wasn't huge
column4: it was filling. There was no need for a box because the pizza was just that good
column5: and we scarfed it all down (politely
column6: of course). The spinach and mushrooms tasted very fresh and the tomatoes that garnished the pizza were slightly crispy. Plenty of cheese yet it didn't feel too heavy. The crust was nicely buttery.
